articles.author: Yas Rana
articles.title: Joe Root nudges up another spot on all-time Test run-scorers' list - can he catch Sachin? - Wisden
articles.content:
Joe Root's 32nd Test hundred, one that was of vital importance to his side, saw him move past Chanderpaul on the list of the Test game's leading run-scorers.
Next on Root's radar is another titan of… [+2477 chars]
